sentences.en: Affirmative action was meant to redress the balance (= make the situation fair ) for minorities.
sentences.cn: 反歧视行动旨在弥补对少数群体的不公平待遇。

sentences.en: Any man deserves redress if he has been injured unfairly.
sentences.cn: 任何人若蒙受不公平的损害都应获得赔偿.

sentences.en: But for the present the courts appear to be working toward redress of legislative imbalances.
sentences.cn: 但是目前,法庭象是在纠正立法上的偏见.

sentences.en: For tort claims, the proper avenue for redress is the Federal Tort Claims Act.
sentences.cn: 若是侵权申诉, 适当地纠正途径应是《联邦侵权赔偿法》.

sentences.en: Hadshe inflicted any wrong upon Germany which the Kaiser bound to redress?
sentences.cn: 她使德国遭受了必须要皇帝来纠正的冤屈 吗 ?

sentences.en: He did all that he possibly could to redress the wrongs.
sentences.cn: 他尽了一切努力革除弊端.

sentences.en: He is seeking redress for what he alleges was an unfair demotion.
sentences.cn: 他要求纠正他所声称的不公正的降级这一错误。

sentences.en: If the statute of limitations has run, the plaintiff is without redress.
sentences.cn: 如果过了法定诉讼时效, 原告将无法得到救济.

sentences.en: Little could be done to redress the situation .
More and more victims turn to litigation to redress wrongs done to them.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的受害人通过诉讼来申雪冤屈。

sentences.en: Nowadays, it appears that too many films are being produced, and a tax on films will help to redress the balance.
sentences.cn: 时下制作的电影太多了, 看来应该征收电影稅来改变这种局面.

sentences.en: Redress in such cases is difficult, if not impossible.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,赔偿即使并非不可能,那也是相当困难的.

sentences.en: So we're trying to redress the balance and to give teachers a sense that both spoken and written language are equally important.
sentences.cn: 所以我们正努力恢复平衡，让教师们感到口语和书面语同样重要。

sentences.en: The only hope of redress is in a lawsuit.
sentences.cn: 获得赔偿的唯一希望就是打官司。

sentences.en: Under the circumstances, you have no redress , ie You cannot demand compensation.
sentences.cn: 在此情况下, 你不能索赔.

sentences.en: US officials said they would, "press vigorously for redress".
sentences.cn: 美国官员说他们会“使劲压以达到矫正的效果”。

sentences.en: You have to suppose a future life to redress the balance of life have on earth.
sentences.cn: 你得假定还有个来世以弥补今生的不平.

sentences.en: You must seek redress in the law courts.
sentences.cn: 你应当通过法律途径要求赔偿.
